item.title: CVE-2022-39053|2024-08-03T11:10:32.480Z -- heimavista%20inc. -- rpage
item.description: Heimavista Rpage has insufficient filtering for platform web URL. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject JavaScript and perform XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack.
